author: Beth Mole
title: Florida bucks social distancing trend as COVID-19 cases skyrocket
description: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis continues to reject the idea of state-wide actions.
content:
Enlarge/ MIAMI GARDENS, FLORIDA - MARCH 30: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis attends a news conference in the Hard Rock Stadium parking lot on March 30, 2020 in Miami Gardens, Florida.
